metadata.title: CVE-2022-47664 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Libde265 1.0.9 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow inff_hevc_put_hevc_qpel_pixels_8_sse

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47664` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libde265-0 - 1.0.11-1
libde265-examples - 1.0.11-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libde265 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.11-1').
